actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the act of June 28, 1948, to provide for the addition of certain property in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, to Independence National Historical Park.

summary.text: Provides for the addition of specified property in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, to Independence National Historical Park. (Amends 10 U.S.C. 407m)

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of June 28, 1948, to provide for the addition of certain property in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, to Independence National Historical Park.
